trans-unit.source: Calculates the approximate size required to display a given number of items

seg-source.mrk: Calculates the approximate size required to display a given number of items

target.mrk: Calculates the approximate size required to display a given number of items

trans-unit.source: [optional] Number of items to be displayed in the control.

seg-source.mrk: Number of items to be displayed in the control.

target.mrk: Number of items to be displayed in the control.

trans-unit.source: If this parameter is set to -1 the message uses the total number of items in the control.

seg-source.mrk: If this parameter is set to -1 the message uses the total number of items in the control.

target.mrk: If this parameter is set to -1 the message uses the total number of items in the control.

trans-unit.source: [optional] Proposed X dimension of the control, in pixels.

seg-source.mrk: Proposed X dimension of the control, in pixels.

target.mrk: Proposed X dimension of the control, in pixels.

trans-unit.source: This parameter can be set to -1 to allow the message to use the current width value.

seg-source.mrk: This parameter can be set to -1 to allow the message to use the current width value.

target.mrk: This parameter can be set to -1 to allow the message to use the current width value.

trans-unit.source: [optional] Proposed Y dimension of the control, in pixels.

seg-source.mrk: Proposed Y dimension of the control, in pixels.

target.mrk: Proposed Y dimension of the control, in pixels.

trans-unit.source: This parameter can be set to -1 to allow the message to use the current height value.

seg-source.mrk: This parameter can be set to -1 to allow the message to use the current height value.

target.mrk: This parameter can be set to -1 to allow the message to use the current height value.

trans-unit.source: Returns an array with the following format:

seg-source.mrk: Returns an array with the following format:

target.mrk: Returns an array with the following format:

trans-unit.source: [0] - Approximate width, in pixels, needed to display the items

seg-source.mrk: [0] - Approximate width, in pixels, needed to display the items

target.mrk: [0] - Approximate width, in pixels, needed to display the items

trans-unit.source: [1] - Approximate height, in pixels, needed to display the items

seg-source.mrk: [1] - Approximate height, in pixels, needed to display the items

target.mrk: [1] - Approximate height, in pixels, needed to display the items

trans-unit.source: Setting the size of the control based on the dimensions provided by this message can optimize redraw and reduce flicker.

seg-source.mrk: Setting the size of the control based on the dimensions provided by this message can optimize redraw and reduce flicker.

target.mrk: Setting the size of the control based on the dimensions provided by this message can optimize redraw and reduce flicker.
